name: Clay's Memory
description:
==Brackeys Game Jam Submission==

Theme : It Is Not Real

Is he real or not?

A mystical force granted you the gift of life but you're new to being "alive". You're not sure whether to think of yourself as real or just an imagination or thought of someone or something. Help Clay find some answers by solving puzzles through what appears to be a toy room!

Gameplay

You will be given interactables which do different things. Play around with them to see how they work.

From left to right : Puzzle piece, Reflector, Weight, Platform

Controls

Left Mouse Button - Interact

D - Move right

A - Move left

Space - Jump

F - Shoot

Press the purple arrow to restart the current level

Tools Used

Godot

Inkscape

Credits

markcmlee - Programmer / Audio

mikelee53 - Programmer / Art

Fun Stuff To Know:

Had a ton of fun animating as I got to learn a lot about the animation workflow in Godot

There are currently two levels but there will probably some bugs along the way that we weren't able to get to...

Additional Notes

- Obviously not finished yet but feedback is always welcome!

- The game currently on works on PC! Did not have enough time to implement touch screen functionality!
